+
'''Roboto''' is a [[Sans-serif#Classification|sans-serif typeface]] family introduced with [[Android_version_history#4.x_Ice_Cream_Sandwich|Android 4.0 "Ice Cream Sandwich"]] operating system.<ref>[http://www.wired.com/gadgetlab/2011/10/android-ice-cream-sandwich-3/]</ref> Google describes the font as "modern, yet approachable" and "emotional".<ref>http://www.engadget.com/2011/10/18/roboto-and-the-new-design-philosophy-of-android-4-0-ice-cream-s/</ref><ref>http://news.in.msn.com/technology/article.aspx?cp-documentid=5526341</ref>
